posts.post_content:
Hello all, I am newer here and I am a Walter Johnson collector if you have anything for sale that is The Big Train please let me know.  

 I love Type 1 photos and Exhibits also.

Thanks,

Tom
Welcome to the group.  Might want to repost in the correct bst section.  The is for 19th century cards

[quote name="chlankf" post=2179245]Welcome to the group.  Might want to repost in the correct bst section.  The is for 19th century cards[/QUOTE]

Well, there are quite a few Johnson postcards. This is my only one now...(not for sale). 

[IMG]https://luckeycards.com/farr.jpg[/IMG]

I would absolutely love to see a current team dress like that for a team photo. That would be freakin' awesome! 


[quote name="Leon" post=2180056]Well, there are quite a few Johnson postcards. This is my only one now...(not for sale). 

[IMG]https://luckeycards.com/farr.jpg[/IMG][/QUOTE]

[quote name="Leon" post=2180056]Well, there are quite a few Johnson postcards. This is my only one now...(not for sale).[/QUOTE]

Wow, Leon, how long have you been hiding this one? Any other of the Barr-Farnman's (sic?) on PCs that you have seen? I think we had this discussion once, as to whether they were ever issued as PCs, but I'm foggy on the conclusions, if any.
that is an amazing postcard ... if you ever want to sell it let me know

[quote name="Hankphenom" post=2180886]Wow, Leon, how long have you been hiding this one? Any other of the Barr-Farnman's (sic?) on PCs that you have seen? I think we had this discussion once, as to whether they were ever issued as PCs, but I'm foggy on the conclusions, if any.[/QUOTE]

I guess I have had it for only about 3 months. HA put it up for auction and didn't mention the provenance AND took it down. Then they ran it again with the correct info and I now only have 1 arm...as it cost me my other one. 
Here is a team photo, proof postcard....

[IMG]https://luckeycards.com/barra2.jpg[/IMG]
